name: Swirly Sun Fused Glass Suncatcher
description:
The sun on this fused light catcher / suncatcher is made of iron oxides fused onto a transparent amber glass backgound. The tack-fused dark amber centerpiece adds interesting dimension and color. It is beautifully accented with coordinating glass beads. Like all of my Wish Originals, it is made with lead-free solder.

Because each light catcher is individually made, yours may differ very slightly from the one pictured.

The glass measures just under 3" square. With the beads it is 5.25" high.


This will come to you in a cotton-filled gift box and will include a suction cup.

A lovely way to add a sparkle of light and color to any window

name: Swirls and Orbs Suncatcher
description:
This Swirls and Orbs Suncatcher / Light Catcher will add a sparkle of light and color to any window. The design on this light catcher is made of iron oxides fused onto a translucent white glass backgound. The orbs are made of lavender, blue, red, and orange murrini slices and add lovely dimension and color. It is beautifully accented with coordinating lavender and iridescent clear glass beads. Like all of my Wish Original Designs, this Light Catcher is made with lead-free solder.

Because each light catcher is individually made, yours may differ very slightly from the one pictured.

The glass measures just under 3" square. It is 5.25" long with the beads.

This will come to you in a cotton-filled gift box and will include a suction cup.

Contemporary and elegant, this Light Catcher is a distinctive accessory for any window!

name: Peacock Feather Fused Glass Lantern
description:
Modern elegance in a timeless motif!

With this fused glass lantern you can add ambient light to elegantly accent any room. The peacock feather is made of iron oxides permanently fused to a translucent ivory base. The eyes of the feather are cut pieces of aqua, olive green, and cobalt. The lantern is beautifully adorned with faceted glass and swarovski pearl beads.

It may be hung from a plant hook on a wall or swag hook in the ceiling. It is suggested for indoor use. If used outdoors, please do not allow the lantern to collect water. As with all of my Wish Originals, it is made with lead-free solder.

***Please note that this item will be made when you order. You will receive your Lantern within 3 weeks of ordering.***

This fused glass lantern holds a standard votive candle. It includes the candle and glass votive cup.

Approx. 19" long (including chain) x 5" wide 
(7" diagonally).
